From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He stoped running after he got a little away from Feline.
He felt a little uneasy. He really didn't know what to say to her, now
that she didn't remember him. He pushed his fears away, and walked back
to her, very calmly.
"Uhh, Hi, Feline."

::DrillBit::

"Killfest, you want to go to the Engine room, or go help the others at
your room?"

::Dollon::

"Right."
He stood ready for battle.
